SEARCH
Package server.Model

Class ItemBag

java.lang.Object
server.Model.ItemBag
public class ItemBag extends Object
This Class represents the ItemBag as described in the game rules. The ItemBag is an ArrayList of PlayableItemTile that are used to fill the blank spaces inside the LivingRoom during the game. Have a look at MyShelfie RuleBook for further information

  • Method Details

    • getBag

      public ArrayList<PlayableItemTile> getBag()
      Returns:
      the ArrayList containing all the PlayableItemTiles in the ItemBag

    • getBagForTest

      public ArrayList<PlayableItemTile> getBagForTest()

    • putTiles

      public void putTiles()
      This method fills the ItemBag with 132 PlayableItemTiles as written in the Game Rules. The PlayableItemTiles are created one by one, in groups of 22 PlayableItemTiles that share the same Colour, using a progressive index to determine their idCode.

    • randPickTile

      public PlayableItemTile randPickTile()
      This method picks a PlayableItemTile randomly from the ItemBag
      Returns:
      the randomly picked PlayableItemTile
